scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copy
scripts.build:all: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --win --mac --linux --config build/electron-builder.config.js
scripts.build:win: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --win --config build/electron-builder.config.js
scripts.publish: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --publish=always --config build/electron-builder.config.js
scripts.publish:win: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --win --publish=always --config build/electron-builder.config.js
scripts.draft: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --publish=onTagOrDraft --config build/electron-builder.config.js
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
